feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.10.3
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Improves toasts for mobile  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3545 (d0384)
  • Improves toasts for mobile  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3547 (36864)
  • Add more tags to same release  -  by @webysther in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3550 (be313)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Moves to the right card depending on route  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3544 (3f860)
  • Adds more translations  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3548 (14ddd)
  • deps:
  • Update dependency splitpanes to ^3.1.8  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3541 (e8eef)
  • Update dependency unplugin-vue-macros to ^2.13.8  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3546 (691a8)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.10.5

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.10.7
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds new menu for custom groups  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3573 (8fbbf)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes --menu-active-bg  -  by @amir20 (47e64)
  • Updates default timeout and adds user agent. see #3610  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3611 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3610 (eba87)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3572 (ff724)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3576 (68ea8)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3578 (2381a)
  • Update module github.com/samber/lo to v1.49.0  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3579 (162f9)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3583 (b9a52)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3584 (c20ce)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3588 (b7328)
  • Update all non-major dependencies to v4.0.3  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3591 (21ae6)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3592 (6c292)
  • Update dependency fuse.js to ^7.1.0  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3593 (9f7b1)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3596 (585e1)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3603 (2de73)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3607 (20fb7)
